member.name: M:Uncast.WebApi.Mvc.AppControllerBase.GetAppUserAsync
member.summary: Gets the current user, or if they are not authenticated.

member.name: M:Uncast.WebApi.Mvc.AppControllerBase.GetAuthenticatedAppUserAsync
member.summary: Gets the current user when the application logic should have ensured that they are authenticated. An example of this situation is when the Authorize attribute is placed on the controller.
